name: Elementary defence!
description:
Everything is elementary! Defence the city from monsters and subdue them!! To do this, you will be given a whole magical fortress! A new one! Don’t damage it!

To control, just build towers of elements. Their combination will summon powerful magic! Different monsters are susceptible to different elements. It’s not difficult.

If you defeat the first boss, you will be able to force him to remove the thickets in the city, which we have not forgotten at all! This will open up additional construction sites! And this is very Cool!!

And remember. The destruction of the fortress will be written into your debt! Good luck.
